devices-tab.title: Devices Tab
devices-tab.content: View all discovered devices including workstations, servers, and network equipment. Each device shows its risk score, operating system, and last seen timestamp.

roles.admin: Configure device discovery settings and manage data source integrations.
roles.analyst: Investigate high-risk devices and track changes in your device inventory.
roles.ciso: Monitor overall device security posture and compliance metrics.
roles.viewer: View device inventory and export reports for compliance purposes.

internet-facing-tab.title: Internet-Facing Assets
internet-facing-tab.content: Monitor assets exposed to the internet including web servers, APIs, and cloud services. These assets require special attention as they are directly accessible to potential attackers.

roles.admin: Configure external attack surface monitoring and set up alerts for new exposures.
roles.analyst: Prioritize investigation of vulnerable internet-facing assets.
roles.ciso: Understand your organization's external attack surface and exposure trends.
roles.viewer: View internet-facing assets and their security status.

accounts-tab.title: Accounts
accounts-tab.content: Track user accounts across your environment. Identify privileged accounts, inactive accounts, and accounts with weak security configurations.

roles.admin: Manage account discovery sources and configure account risk policies.
roles.analyst: Investigate suspicious account activity and privilege escalation attempts.
roles.ciso: Monitor privileged account usage and identity security posture.
roles.viewer: View account inventory and access reports.

applications-tab.title: Applications
applications-tab.content: Discover and track applications running in your environment, including web applications, SaaS services, and internal applications.

roles.admin: Configure application discovery and manage application inventory.
roles.analyst: Identify unauthorized or vulnerable applications.
roles.ciso: Understand application portfolio and shadow IT risks.
roles.viewer: View application inventory and usage statistics.

cloud-resources-tab.title: Cloud Resources
cloud-resources-tab.content: Monitor cloud infrastructure across AWS, Azure, GCP, and other cloud providers. Track VMs, storage, databases, and serverless resources.

roles.admin: Configure cloud provider integrations and manage cloud asset discovery.
roles.analyst: Investigate misconfigured cloud resources and security violations.
roles.ciso: Monitor cloud security posture and multi-cloud risk exposure.
roles.viewer: View cloud resource inventory and compliance status.

apis-tab.title: APIs
apis-tab.content: Discover and monitor APIs in your environment. Track API endpoints, authentication methods, and data exposure risks.

roles.admin: Configure API discovery and set up API security monitoring.
roles.analyst: Investigate API vulnerabilities and unauthorized API usage.
roles.ciso: Understand API attack surface and data exposure risks.
roles.viewer: View API inventory and security assessments.

risk-index.title: Risk Index
risk-index.content: The Risk Index is a calculated score (0-100) representing your organization's overall security posture. Higher scores indicate greater risk exposure.
risk-index.calculation: Calculated based on device vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, threat intelligence, and exposure to known attack patterns.

roles.admin: Configure risk scoring parameters and thresholds for alerts.
roles.analyst: Use risk scores to prioritize investigation and remediation efforts.
roles.ciso: Track risk trends over time and measure security program effectiveness.
roles.viewer: View current risk index and historical trends.

total-devices.title: Total Devices
total-devices.content: The total number of devices discovered in your environment. This includes all endpoints, servers, network devices, and IoT devices detected by configured data sources.

roles.admin: Ensure complete device coverage by configuring all available data sources.
roles.analyst: Monitor for unexpected changes in device count that may indicate new threats.
roles.ciso: Track asset inventory growth and coverage completeness.
roles.viewer: View total device count and inventory statistics.

data-sources.title: Data Sources
data-sources.content: Data sources are integrations that automatically discover and inventory assets. Common sources include Active Directory, cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP), vulnerability scanners, and network discovery tools.

roles.admin: Configure and maintain data source connections. Monitor data source health and sync status.
roles.analyst: Understand which data sources provide visibility into different asset types.
roles.ciso: Ensure comprehensive coverage across all business units and environments.
roles.viewer: View configured data sources and their status.

monthly-trend.title: Monthly Trend
monthly-trend.content: Visualizes changes in your attack surface over the past 12 months. Track growth in devices, internet-facing assets, and overall risk exposure.

roles.admin: Monitor discovery effectiveness and identify gaps in asset visibility.
roles.analyst: Identify unusual spikes that may indicate security incidents or misconfigurations.
roles.ciso: Track security posture improvements and measure program impact.
roles.viewer: View historical trends and generate reports.

alerts-tab.title: Alerts
alerts-tab.content: Security alerts generated by detection rules and threat intelligence. Each alert represents a potential security incident requiring investigation.

roles.admin: Configure alert sources, detection rules, and escalation workflows.
roles.analyst: Triage, investigate, and respond to security alerts.
roles.ciso: Monitor alert volumes, response times, and team performance.
roles.viewer: View alerts and export reports for compliance purposes.

investigations-tab.title: Investigations
investigations-tab.content: Active security investigations combining multiple related alerts. Investigations help you understand the full scope of an attack campaign.

roles.admin: Configure investigation workflows and automated correlation rules.
roles.analyst: Conduct investigations, document findings, and coordinate response actions.
roles.ciso: Monitor investigation status and ensure timely incident resolution.
roles.viewer: View investigation summaries and outcomes.

severity-critical.title: Critical Severity
severity-critical.content: Critical alerts require immediate action. These represent active threats, confirmed compromises, or high-impact security incidents.

roles.admin: Ensure 24/7 coverage for critical alert response.
roles.analyst: Immediately investigate and contain critical threats.
roles.ciso: Monitor critical alert trends and ensure adequate response capabilities.
roles.viewer: View critical alerts for awareness and reporting.

severity-high.title: High Severity
severity-high.content: High severity alerts indicate serious security concerns that require prompt investigation within 24 hours.

roles.admin: Configure escalation for high severity alerts approaching SLA deadlines.
roles.analyst: Investigate high severity alerts and determine appropriate response actions.
roles.ciso: Monitor high severity alert resolution rates and response times.
roles.viewer: View high severity alerts and their resolution status.

status-new.title: New Status
status-new.content: Newly generated alerts that have not yet been assigned to an analyst for investigation.

roles.admin: Configure automatic assignment rules and load balancing.
roles.analyst: Review new alerts and claim those requiring investigation.
roles.ciso: Monitor queue depth and ensure timely alert assignment.
roles.viewer: View new alerts in the queue.

status-in-progress.title: In Progress
status-in-progress.content: Alerts currently under active investigation by security analysts.

roles.admin: Monitor investigation progress and provide escalation support.
roles.analyst: Document investigation steps, findings, and response actions taken.
roles.ciso: Track investigation duration and resource allocation.
roles.viewer: View ongoing investigations and their current status.

correlation-graph.title: Correlation Graph
correlation-graph.content: Visual representation of related security events. Shows how alerts are connected through common indicators like IP addresses, users, files, or attack techniques.

roles.admin: Configure correlation rules and graph visualization settings.
roles.analyst: Use the graph to understand attack chains and identify related incidents.
roles.ciso: Visualize attack campaigns and understand threat actor tactics.
roles.viewer: View correlation graphs for completed investigations.

mitre-attack.title: MITRE ATT&CK
mitre-attack.content: Maps detected activities to the MITRE ATT&CK framework, showing which tactics and techniques were observed in the attack.

roles.admin: Configure MITRE ATT&CK mapping for detection rules.
roles.analyst: Understand attacker tactics and predict next steps in the attack chain.
roles.ciso: Identify gaps in detection coverage across the ATT&CK matrix.
roles.viewer: View MITRE ATT&CK mappings for security incidents.

response-actions.title: Response Actions
response-actions.content: Automated and manual actions to contain and remediate threats. Includes isolating endpoints, blocking IPs, quarantining files, and disabling accounts.

roles.admin: Configure automated response playbooks and approval workflows.
roles.analyst: Execute response actions to contain threats and prevent spread.
roles.ciso: Monitor response effectiveness and measure mean time to contain.
roles.viewer: View response actions taken during incidents.

endpoints-tab.title: Endpoints
endpoints-tab.content: All managed endpoints including workstations, laptops, and mobile devices. Shows agent status, security policy compliance, and last check-in time.

roles.admin: Deploy and manage endpoint agents. Configure security policies.
roles.analyst: Investigate compromised endpoints and collect forensic evidence.
roles.ciso: Monitor endpoint security coverage and compliance rates.
roles.viewer: View endpoint inventory and compliance status.

servers-tab.title: Servers
servers-tab.content: Server inventory including physical servers, virtual machines, and containers. Monitor patch status, running services, and security configurations.

roles.admin: Manage server agents and configure server-specific security policies.
roles.analyst: Investigate server compromises and lateral movement attempts.
roles.ciso: Monitor critical server security and compliance with hardening standards.
roles.viewer: View server inventory and security status.

mobile-tab.title: Mobile Devices
mobile-tab.content: Mobile device inventory including smartphones and tablets. Track device compliance, app installations, and mobile threat detections.

roles.admin: Configure mobile device management and security policies.
roles.analyst: Investigate mobile threats and unauthorized app installations.
roles.ciso: Monitor mobile security posture and BYOD compliance.
roles.viewer: View mobile device inventory and compliance status.

agent-status-online.title: Online Status
agent-status-online.content: Endpoint agent is connected and actively reporting security telemetry to the management server.

roles.admin: Ensure agents remain online and troubleshoot connectivity issues.
roles.analyst: Verify agent connectivity before executing response actions.
roles.ciso: Monitor agent uptime and coverage metrics.
roles.viewer: View which endpoints are currently online.

agent-status-offline.title: Offline Status
agent-status-offline.content: Endpoint agent has not reported to the management server for more than 24 hours. May indicate connectivity issues, powered-off devices, or agent problems.

roles.admin: Investigate offline agents and restore connectivity.
roles.analyst: Consider offline status when investigating potential compromises.
roles.ciso: Monitor offline agent trends and ensure adequate coverage.
roles.viewer: View offline endpoints and their last seen time.

policy-compliance.title: Policy Compliance
policy-compliance.content: Percentage of endpoints meeting security policy requirements. Policies define required security controls like antivirus, firewall, encryption, and patch levels.

roles.admin: Configure security policies and remediation workflows.
roles.analyst: Identify non-compliant endpoints that may be vulnerable.
roles.ciso: Track compliance trends and measure security control effectiveness.
roles.viewer: View compliance rates and generate compliance reports.

isolation-action.title: Network Isolation
isolation-action.content: Isolate a compromised endpoint from the network to prevent lateral movement. The endpoint can still communicate with the management server for remediation.

roles.admin: Configure isolation policies and network access controls.
roles.analyst: Isolate compromised endpoints during active incident response.
roles.ciso: Monitor isolation usage and ensure proper containment procedures.
roles.viewer: View which endpoints are currently isolated.

patch-status.title: Patch Status
patch-status.content: Shows operating system and application patch levels. Identifies missing critical security updates and vulnerable software versions.

roles.admin: Configure patch management policies and deployment schedules.
roles.analyst: Prioritize investigation of unpatched systems with known exploits.
roles.ciso: Monitor patch compliance and vulnerability exposure.
roles.viewer: View patch status and generate vulnerability reports.

installed-software.title: Installed Software
installed-software.content: Complete inventory of installed applications on each endpoint. Helps identify unauthorized software, outdated versions, and potential security risks.

roles.admin: Configure software inventory collection and application control policies.
roles.analyst: Identify malicious or unauthorized software during investigations.
roles.ciso: Monitor software license compliance and shadow IT usage.
roles.viewer: View software inventory and generate asset reports.

forensics.title: Forensic Evidence Collection
forensics.content: Collect forensic evidence from endpoints including memory dumps, disk images, event logs, and file artifacts for detailed investigation.

roles.admin: Configure forensic collection policies and storage retention.
roles.analyst: Collect and analyze forensic evidence during incident investigations.
roles.ciso: Ensure forensic capabilities meet legal and compliance requirements.
roles.viewer: View forensic collection history and evidence inventory.
